did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, Memorabilia, Movie Film, Newspapers, Photographs, Printed Materials.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers of Dr. Joyce Brothers include correspondence, subject files, letters received, scripts, clippings, contracts, awards, photographs, cartoons, slides, and articles and books by Dr. Brothers. Audiovisual Archives of Dr. Joyce Brothers include 463 motion picture films, ca. 796 video tapes, and 184 audio recordings.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Cornell University Class of 1947, Columbia University Ph.D. 1955.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Papers of Dr. Joyce Brothers include correspondence, subject files, letters received, scripts, clippings, contracts, awards, photographs, cartoons, slides, and articles and books by Dr. Brothers. Audiovisual Archives of Dr. Joyce Brothers include 463 motion picture films, ca. 796 video tapes, and 184 audio recordings.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Dr. Joyce Brothers papers, #4254. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a copy of the printed finding aid. (Searchable PDF file)

scopecontent.p: Not all the material in the collection is covered by this guide.
